clip.quote: Transitioning at 50 is a difficult time to use your sphere because most people that you know are already in their forever home.
clip.why_clipworthy: It highlights the unique challenges of starting a real estate career later in life.
clip.suggested_hook: Facing a career change at 50? Here's how one agent overcame the odds.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Facing a career change at 50? Discover how one agent defied the odds!",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) Meet Julia Stauffer, who transitioned to real estate at 50. She faced a unique challenge: most of her sphere was already settled in their forever homes.",
    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) Julia shares, 'Transitioning at 50 is tough because your network is settled. But I focused on personal branding and video content to engage new clients.'",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) This matters because building a brand and leveraging video can open doors, even when your initial network seems tapped out.",
    "CTA": "(0:52-0:60) Ready to pivot your career? Start by crafting your personal brand and embracing video. What's your next step?"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Starting a new career at 50? Learn how Julia Stauffer built her real estate success! #CareerChange",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstateJourney", "#CareerChange", "#PersonalBranding", "#VideoMarketing", "#RealEstateAdvice"],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "real_talk"
}
```

clip.quote: If you want to double your income, double your leads.
clip.why_clipworthy: This simple yet powerful insight can motivate agents to focus on lead generation.
clip.suggested_hook: The secret to doubling your real estate income might be simpler than you think.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "What if doubling your real estate income is as simple as doubling your leads?",
    "SETUP": "Meet Julia Stauffer, a real estate expert who transitioned into the industry at 50. She's here to share a game-changing insight.",
    "INSIGHT": "Julia says, 'If you want to double your income, double your leads.' This straightforward approach can transform your business by focusing on lead generation.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "Why does this matter? By prioritizing lead generation, you can significantly boost your income. Start by leveraging referrals and personal branding.",
    "CTA": "Ready to double your leads? Start today by creating engaging video content. Share your journey and watch your business grow!"
  },
```
